definition: to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: It can be easily used with freshing touch, non greasy, protect the skin with favorable moisturizing effect.
sentences.chinese: 虽为乳霜，却出人意料地易于涂抹，触感清爽不油腻。

sentences.english: Remain within the sight and touch of the Holy Spirit, my beloved Spouse.
sentences.chinese: 请长留在圣神的目光和触感之中，祂是我心爱的净配。

sentences.english: Love comes to man through his senses , to woman through her imagination.
sentences.chinese: 男人靠触感来启发爱意，女人透过想像感受情爱。

sentences.english: It brings you cozy feeling with soft tactile.
sentences.chinese: 它以柔软的触感带给你惬意的感觉。

sentences.english: The product feels smooth and light on my face, fills in lines and give a flawless finish.
sentences.chinese: 它触感光滑，上脸通透，填充纹路给我无瑕疵的妆效。

sentences.english: The clothing people wore, the way their faces looked, the sounds and smells and how things felt to the touch.
sentences.chinese: 人们的穿着，面貌，声音，气味以及对事物的触感。

sentences.english: We’re talking bubble-wrap levels of tactile stimulation here, people.
sentences.chinese: 伙计们，我说的可是气泡衬垫包装的那种触感呢。

sentences.english: I like the modern comfort touch and light color.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这现代的舒适触感和浅色系。

sentences.english: Soft tactility is tender as cream, create a transparent, natural and glossy makeup effect.
sentences.chinese: 触感柔软霜状质地，打造粉嫩透明，自然光泽的妆效。

sentences.english: At the same time, mellow side of the arc has a good touch, let people can not put it away.
sentences.chinese: 同时，圆润的弧边有着良好的触感，让人爱不释脚。

sentences.english: Prevent chapping and cure chilblain with fine nature.
sentences.chinese: 触感细腻自然，防爆裂治冻疮。

sentences.english: The soft felt surface makes it a pleasure for fingers to tip – a cosy keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 表面柔软的感觉给予很好的触感，是一个舒适的键盘。

sentences.english: I have some nice paintings, comfortable furniture and a gorgeous sleigh bed but the home as a whole lacks that special touch.
sentences.chinese: 但作为一个整体，它还缺少一种特别的触感。

sentences.english: We will add one final touch to it.
sentences.chinese: 我们将对它添加一些决定性的触感。

sentences.english: DELICATE】A pianist or a violinist must have a delicate sense of touch.
sentences.chinese: 钢琴家或小提琴家都必须有灵敏的触感。

sentences.english: She slowly grew aware that her hand had felt something very pleasant to touch.
sentences.chinese: 她慢慢意识到自己的手摸到了一些触感很舒服的东西。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
